com.versant.connector.common
Interface ConfigManager

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public interface ConfigManager
extends java.io.Serializable

ConfigManager interface is primarily defined for integrating with non-reference application servers. This interface provides JTA resource and its registration for the target application server. ConfigManager implementations for WebLogic and WebSphere application servers are provided. For integration with other application servers, an implementation of this interface needs to be provided and is specified through the deployment descriptor property ConfigManagerName.
